#summary A high-level roadmap for the svg-edit project.

= Introduction =

This document covers future versions of svg-edit.  For previous versions, see the VersionHistory

= Version 2.2 ==
== Approved Features ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=31 Multiselect Mode]
 * ([http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/list?can=2&q=label%3ANeededFor-2.2 full list])
== New Features Added ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=27 Resize Elements]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/svg-edit/issues/detail?id=19 Undo/Redo Actions]
 * Contextual tools for rect, circle, ellipse, line elements
 * Some updated button images
 * Stretched the UI to fit the browser window
 * Resizing of the SVG image
